text.title: Fire kills eleven at oil worker housing in Alkhobar, Saudi Arabia
text.head: Fire kills eleven at oil worker housing in Alkhobar, Saudi Arabia
Sources

list.item: Mohammed al-Sulami. "Fire at Alkhobar complex kills 11, injures over 200" — Arab News , August 31, 2015
"Fire kills 11 in Saudi Aramco compound" — Middle East Eye , August 31, 2015
"Deadly Saudi Arabia fire at Aramco complex in Khobar" — BBC News Online , August 30, 2015
